com.myscript.atk.diagram.widget

Interface DiagramWidgetApi.DiagramListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    DiagramWidgetApi

    public static interface DiagramWidgetApi.DiagramListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(DiagramWidgetApi widget, String errorMessage)
      Called when a en error happened in configuration of the recognition engine.
      void onSelectionModified(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
      Called when the selection was modified.
      void onSessionEnd(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
      Called when a recognition session ends.
      void onSessionStart(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
      Called when a recognition session starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionStart

        void onSessionStart(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
        Called when a recognition session starts.

        A recognition session starts when the user starts writing on the screen.

        The session can also start after an undo or redo or after any context restoration such as screen rotation.

        Parameters:
        widget - the Diagram Widget instance involved.

      • onSessionEnd

        void onSessionEnd(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
        Called when a recognition session ends.
        Parameters:
        widget - the Diagram Widget instance involved.

      • onSelectionModified

        void onSelectionModified(DiagramWidgetApi widget)
        Called when the selection was modified.
        Parameters:
        widget - the Diagram Widget instance involved.

      • onError

        void onError(DiagramWidgetApi widget,
             String errorMessage)
        Called when a en error happened in configuration of the recognition engine. See configure method
        Parameters:
        widget - the Diagram Widget instance involved.
